title: S3 Ep22: S3, The State v. Dennis Perry - Episode 13 – Look At This Photograph
itunes:title: S3, The State v. Dennis Perry - Episode 13 – Look At This Photograph
description:
October 22, 2018 / Dennis Perry's ex-girlfriend's mother kept a photograph of him, years after her daughter and Dennis had broken up. And that photograph would eventually lead to Dennis' conviction. But perhaps not in the way as the prosecution would claim at Dennis' trial.

Episode scoring music by Blue Dot Sessions, Patrick Cortes, and Chris Zabriskie.

This episode was sponsored by Boll & Branch, FabFitFun, Bombas, and BodyBoss.
